thread.title: William Burke
thread.title_full: PlantShed New York Flowers reviewed by William Burke

author: William Burke
title: William Burke
text: I wanted to do something nice for my wife. I decided to get her flowers at the last minute. It was 3:30 pm and I really wanted to have something delivered that same day. Plant Shed not only had a great selection for reasonable prices but had a delivery time between 5pm and 8:30. I had tried something like this in the past with another company and it was an absolute disaster. Well, this time, the flowers came right on time and she loved them!
